page.title: 14Primary School Census
page.content: {160 families}have children attending the{Ringmer Primary School. {Area of family residences: {}Village centre:102 Broyle Estate:41 Surrounding hamlets:17 {Length of time in village: less than 1 yr:4 1 yr:14 2 yrs:9 3 yrs:4 4 yrs:8 5 yrs:36 6 yrs:7 7 yrs:8 8 yrs:13 9 yrs:9 10 yrs:17 11 yrs:7 12 yrs:11 {Pets:}All but 15 families kept pets. cats:56 families dogs:46 families cats and dogs:27 families other pets:72 families {General 22 families without a car 12 families without television 48 families possess a coal fire 28 families:children all boys 20 families:children all girls In recent years most{new families}have settled in the village centre.
